solution_line_template: There is an equal number of clownfish and blowfish, which means there are {total_fish} fish / {fish_types} = <<{total_fish}/{fish_types}={blowfish}>>{blowfish} blowfish.
Since some stay in their tanks, there are {blowfish} blowfish - {blowfish_stay} blowfish = <<{blowfish}-{blowfish_stay}={blowfish_display}>>{blowfish_display} blowfish in the display tank.

There were the same amount of clownfish until {clownfish_joining} clownfish / {clownfish_swim_back_divisor} = <<{clownfish_joining}/{clownfish_swim_back_divisor}={clownfish_swim_back}>>{clownfish_swim_back} clownfish swam back to their own tank.
This leaves {clownfish_joining} clownfish - {clownfish_swim_back} clownfish = <<{clownfish_joining}-{clownfish_swim_back}={clownfish_display}>>{clownfish_display} clownfish in the display tank.
